trans-unit.source: Provides an interface to expose Win32 HWND handles.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma interface para expor os identificadores do Win32 HWND.

trans-unit.source: This interface is implemented on objects that expose Win32 HWND handles.
trans-unit.target: Essa interface é implementada em objetos que expõem os identificadores de HWND Win32.

trans-unit.source: The resultant handle can be used with Win32 API calls.
trans-unit.target: O identificador resultante pode ser usado com as chamadas de API do Win32.

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property of `label1` to the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window.Handle%2A> of `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> propriedade `label1` ao atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window.Handle%2A> de `Form1`.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> called `Form1` with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> called `label1` on it.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo pressupõe que você tenha um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> chamado `Form1` com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> chamado `label1` nele.

trans-unit.source: Gets the handle to the window represented by the implementer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o identificador para a janela representada pelo implementador.

trans-unit.source: A handle to the window represented by the implementer.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador para a janela representada pelo implementador.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the implementer, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window.Handle%2A> property could change during the life of the window.
trans-unit.target: Dependendo do implementador, o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window.Handle%2A> propriedade pode ser alteradas durante a vida útil da janela.

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property of `label1` to the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window.Handle%2A> of `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> propriedade `label1` ao atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window.Handle%2A> de `Form1`.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> called `Form1` with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> called `label1` on it.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo pressupõe que você tenha um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> chamado `Form1` com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> chamado `label1` nele.
